Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2012 09:03AM eliz50 wrote: I have to say Chemo was the worst thing i have ever done ! all of the storys and just the thought of cancer.  but it really wasn't that bad ......i thought the worst. my doctor and nurses were great. i think the worst part was looseing my hair. not the chemo ...i really found myself during that time. i wore my bandanas proudly. i am a survivor and all of you here on breastcancer.org helped me so much. we formed a group of the july jedis and chatted about everything.  Don't be scared your getting rid of the cancer. your taking charge of your life.  we all can help you !
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf
